author: John Bowden
title: China: Pompeo has 'sinister motive' for pushing 'Wuhan virus' language
description: China's government is taking aim at Secretary of State Mike Pompeo in the country's harshest criticism yet of Trump administration officials who have insisted on referring to COVID-19 as the "Wuhan" or "China" virus....
content: China's government is taking aim at Secretary of State Mike PompeoMichael (Mike) Richard PompeoTwitter comes under fire over Chinese disinformation on coronavirus spreadOvernight Defense: Pentagon officials estimate coronavirus crisis could last months | Thre… [+2182 chars]
